markings: LL in red, Degas Atelier stamp (L.657); verso in red pencil [ROUART] top of board; verso in blue pencil [DEGAS/Portrait di Marguerite Degas]
medium: Black chalk on brown paper heightened with white
provenance: Atélier Degas, Lugt 657, Paris (in 1917). Rouart, Paris. David Daniels, New York (by 1958-1960, gave to MIA)
title: Portrait of Marguerite Degas
